name: Aggressor's Bane
description: Reduces incoming damage by 15%, but also increases enemy aggression towards the wearer, and increases enemy Awareness Range by 200%.

name: Akari War Band
description: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks increases Crit Chance by 15% and Crit damage by 15% for 20 seconds.

name: Alchemist's Jewel
description: Increase Armor Effectiveness by 50% and Armor Encumbrance by 25

name: Amber Moonstone
description: When the wearer's Health drops below 25% they gain 25% damage reduction and immunity to STATUS effects.

name: Backbreaker Ring
description: Increase Melee Backstab dmg by 30%.

name: Band of Accord
description: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% per ally also wearing this ring and is shared with other allies.

name: Band of Castor
description: Increases Melee Speed by 10%, but reduces Fire Rate by 15%. While wearing BAND OF POLLUX, Melee damage is increased by 10%, Evade Speed is increased by 15% and Encumbrance is reduced by 25.

name: Band of Discord
description: Reduces Consumable Use Speed by 15%. Dragon Hearts heal the wearer with 125 Health over 30 seconds.

name: Band of Pollux
description: Increases Melee damage by 15%, but reduces Ranged damage by 15%. While wearing BAND OF CASTOR, Melee Damage is increased by 10%, Evade Speed is increased by 15% Encumbrance is reduced by 25.

name: Band of Strength
description: Melee Charge Attacks increase Melee damage by 5% for 10 seconds. Stacks 4 times.

name: Black Cat Band
description: When taking fatal damage, instead of dying, the wearer's Health will drop to 1, and Movement Speed will increase by 25% for 10 seconds. 1 minute cooldown.

name: Blood Font
description: Increases Health regenerates by 0.334 per second and increases all Healing Effectiveness by 15%.

name: Bloodletter's Insignia
description: BLEEDING effects applied by the wearer steal 10% of the damage dealt and return it to the wearer as Health.

name: Braided Thorns
description: Increase Crit Chance by 10%. Gain an additional 10% for 10 seconds after slaying an enemy.

name: Bright Steel Ring
description: Gives wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of their Armor Encumbrance.

name: Burden of the Devoted
description: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 15%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

name: Burden of the Follower
description: Reduces Fire Rate by 35%. Increases Mod Power generation by 100%.

name: Burden of the Gambler
description: Disables Weakspot damage bonus. Increases Crit Chance by 15% and Crit Damage by 25%.

name: Burden of the Reckless
description: Disables healing from Dragon hearts. Perfect dodging enemy attacks will regenerate 5% of the wearer's Max Health per second over 5 seconds.

name: Burden of the Warlord
description: Reduces effective range of all firearms by 50%. Increases all damage dealt by 15%.

name: Celerity Stone
description: Increases Consumable Use Speed by 40%. After using a Consumable, increases Reload Speed by 20% and Weapon Swap Speed by 25% for 15s.

name: Compulsion Loop
description: Increase Movement Speed by 20%, Fire Rate by 15%, and Melee Speed by 10% for 7 seconds after slaying an enemy.

name: Deceiver's Band
description: Increases Evade Speed by 25% and Movement Speed by 15% for 10 seconds after performing a slide.

name: Devouring Loop
description: Critical Hits have a 5% chance to deal 4x damage.

name: Empowering Loop
description: Increases Ranged damage by 25%, but decrease Fire rate by 10%.

name: Evoker's Seal
description: Refunds 15% Mod Power on use.

name: Ezlan's Band
description: ncreases Health by 25 and Health regeneration by 0.238 per second.

name: Five Fingered Ring
description: Increases Unarmed Melee damage by 50%, Crit damage by 25%, and Crit Chance by 20%.

name: Gift of the Iskal
description: Mod power is generated slowly over time, but reduces the wearer's Healing Effectiveness by 15%.

name: Gravity Stone
description: Increases damage by 20% when there are at least 2 enemies within 10 meters of the wearer.

name: Grim Coil
description: Reloading a weapon after dealing at least 40% of the base damage from a single magazine increases damage by 7% for 20 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

name: Guardian's Ring
description: Reduce incoming melee damage by 20%.

name: Gunslinger's Ring
description: Increases Firearm Swap Speed by 50% and Fire Rate by 10%.

name: Heart of the Wolf
description: Increases Max Stamina by 25 and Movement Speed by 10%.

name: Heartseeker
description: Provides a 100% Crit Chance against non-aggressive enemies and increases Crit Damage by 20%.

name: Hero's Ring
description: Increases Movement Speed by 25% while sprinting towards a wounded teammate. Revive Speed is increased by 100% and the wearer cannot by staggered while reviving.

name: Hunter's Band
description: Increases Ranged damage by 10% and Weakspot damage by 20%.

name: Hunter's Halo
description: Increase the effective Range of all firearms by 6m.

name: Iskal Hunter Band
description: Reduces Spread by 40%.

name: Jewel of the Black Sun
description: Increases Ranged damage by 7% for 20 seconds after a Ranged kill. Stacks 3 times.

name: Juggernaut Band
description: After sprinting for 2 seconds, incoming damage is reduced by 10%, Movement Speed is increased by 15%, stagger level is reduced by 1, and the wearer will perform the heaviest evade.

name: Keeper's Ring
description: Increases resistance to all ELEMENTAL damage by 20.

name: Leech Ember
description: Melee hits steal 5% of the base damage dealt as Health from enemies.

name: Loop of Prosperity
description: Metal materials acquired on pickup are doubled.

name: Mother's Ring
description: Reduces incoming Ranged Damage by 20%.

name: Pearl of Luminescence
description: Wearer has a 70% chance to double the amount of Lumenite Crystal acquired on pickup when killing Elite enemies.

name: Pillar of Stone
description: Reduces Recoil by 30% and Weapon Sway by 60%. Standing Aim Movement Speed is increased by 50%.

name: Prismatic Diamond Ring
description: Increases ELEMENTAL damage by 10%.

name: Provisioner Ring
description: Firearms reload over time while stowed.

name: Razorstone
description: Melee Charge Attacks apply the BLEEDING effect, dealing 600 over 20 seconds.

name: Restriction Cord
description: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces incoming damage by 15%.

name: Ring of Elusion
description: Perfect Dodging enemy attacks refunds 50 Stamina and reduces Stamina Cost by 100% for 10 seconds.

name: Ring of Evasion
description: Moderately increases Evade Window and increase Evade Speed by 10%.

name: Ring of Flawless Beauty
description: Ranged Weakspot damage is increased by 40%. Ranged damage is reduced by 20% when failing to shoot a weakspot.

name: Ring of Honor
description: Increases Health by 10, Stamina by 10, and reduces Armor Encumbrance by 10.

name: Ring of Shadows
description: Reduces enemy Awareness Range by 25%. Increases damage against non-aggressive enemies by 15%.

name: Ring of Supremacy
description: Increases all damage dealt by 20% after the wearer's health has been full for at least 10 seconds.

name: Ring of Synergy
description: Increase Teamwork effect by 10% and Revival speed by 11% per ally also wearing this ring

name: Ring of the Admiral
description: Damage received is increased by 300%. All damage dealt is increased by 15%.

name: Ring of the Mantis
description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Crit damage by 20% when the wearer stops moving for at least 1 seconds.

name: Ring of the Punisher
description: Increases damage to enemies affected by STATUS effects. Each unique STATUS applied increases all damage by 5%.

name: Ring of the Unclean
description: Unarmed Melee attacks deal 2x damage. Heavy Flops deal 4x damage.

name: Root Circlet
description: Increases Melee Speed by 15%.

name: Sagestone
description: Increases earned Experience by 30%.

name: Scavenger's Ring
description: Collecting Scrap, Iron, and Ammo pickups regenerates 3% of Max Health and increases Ranged and Melee damage by 10% for 30 seconds.

name: Serpent's Fang
description: Increased Charged Melee Damage by 20%.

name: Soul Ember
description: Summon Health is reduced by 60%. On death they'll explode dealing 150 plus 15 damage per weapon level within 4 meters. Summons that explode normally will deal 25% bonus damage. Excess summons will explode when another summon is used.

name: Soul Link
description: Summons will steal 5% of the damage dealt and return it to the wearer as Health.

name: Spirit Stone
description: Increases Mod Power generation by 25% and Weapon Mod damage by 10%.

name: Stockpile Circlet
description: Increases Max Ammo reserves for all firearms by 50%.

name: Stone of Balance
description: Increases Ranged and Melee damage by 12%.

name: Swashbuckler's Signet
description: Build one buff stack every 20 seconds up to a max of 3 stacks. Melee Charge Attacks consume one stack and replenish 15% of the wearer's ammo capacity for both firearms.

name: Vanguard Ring
description: Melee Charge attacks reduce incoming and outgoing damage by 4% and increase enemy aggression towards the wearer for 15 seconds. Stacks 5 times.

name: Volatile Gem
description: Dragon Hearts explode dealing 600 damage plus 10% per gear score and inflict 100% extra stagger damage within 5 meters.
